question_id: Hitung berapa banyak film pada setiap rating.
sql_query:
SELECT
  r.rating AS rating,
  COUNT(f.film_id) AS jumlah_film
FROM film AS f
JOIN film_actor AS fa
  ON f.film_id = fa.film_id
JOIN actor AS a
  ON fa.actor_id = a.actor_id
JOIN rental AS r
  ON f.film_id = r.film_id
GROUP BY
  r.rating
ORDER BY
  r.rating
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
  r.rating AS rating,
  COUNT(f.film_id) AS jumlah_film
FROM film AS f
JOIN film_actor AS fa
  ON f.film_id = fa.film_id
JOIN actor AS a
  ON fa.actor_id = a.actor_id
JOIN rental AS r
  ON f.film_id = r.film_id
GROUP BY
  r.rating
ORDER BY
  r.rating;
```
